description: I think the build flags might not be working correctly for the Nova docs built from RST - Looking at http://nova.openstack.org/object.model.html it appears the graphviz source isn't rendering as an image.
title: Build Sphinx problem: Graphviz isn't building an image correctly for /doc/source/object.model.rst

comments.content: I think the build flags might not be working correctly for the Nova docs built from RST - Looking at http://nova.openstack.org/object.model.html it appears the graphviz source isn't rendering as an image.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~annegentle

comments.content: Graphviz wasn't installed on the Hudson box. Should be fixed now.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren

comments.content: You should see it take effect next time someone gets something committed to trunk and the docs are rebuilt.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren
